about.title: What is Syntropedia?
about.p1: Syntropedia is an open-source platform that gathers knowledge about plant species for agroforestry systems and syntropic agriculture.
about.p2: Our community documents, shares, and learns about plants that transform agriculture, promoting regenerative and sustainable practices.
about.p3: All data is licensed under Creative Commons, ensuring free access to knowledge for farmers, researchers, and enthusiasts.

step1.title: Login
step1.description: Connect via Discourse forum to start contributing

step2.title: Add photos
step2.description: Contribute images of species you know

step3.title: Participate
step3.description: Discuss, share experiences, and learn from the community
